wikipedia_page.main:
Bryan William Stewart (born September 1985) is an English footballer
Youth graduate Bryan Stewart made his City debut in August 2003 voted youth team player of the year 03/04. In June 2006, he left the club when declining to sign a new contract in favour of a career outside of football Stewart re-joined York City on trial in August 2008 and played for the reserves in an 8–0 defeat to Scunthorpe United.
